titleStmt.title: The Scots figgaries, or, A knot of knaves a comedy.
titleStmt.author: Tatham, John, fl. 1632-1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W.H. for Iohn Tey ...,

notesStmt.note: First ed.? with "new" printed in roman letters in the imprint. One of two editions published in the same year. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Newberry Library.
